definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Limousin bulls stand at a cattle auction in Gross Kreutz, Germany.
sentences.chinese: 利木赞牛站在一个家畜拍卖上，大克罗伊茨，德国。

sentences.english: B. The worldwide epizootic will not decrease immediately.
sentences.chinese: 这个世界范围的家畜流行病不会很快减少。

sentences.english: Horses, dogs, cats, cows, and pigs are domestic animals.
sentences.chinese: 马，狗，猫，牛及猪都是家畜。

sentences.english: Farcinia is spreading seriously and those families which raise cattles must take measures against it.
sentences.chinese: 疽病传染严重，养家畜的家庭一定要做好防范。

sentences.english: Cloned livestock are the next frontier in biotech farming.
sentences.chinese: 克隆家畜成为生物技术农业下一个前沿。

sentences.english: They are bred in farms, just like pigs, beefs , lambs, chicken and other farm animals.
sentences.chinese: 他们是在农场长大，就像猪，肉牛，羊，鸡等家畜。

sentences.english: Horses are the only species of domestic animal that can be naturally infected with Hendra virus.
sentences.chinese: 马是可能自然感染亨德拉病毒的唯一家畜。

sentences.english: But a drug similar to vancomycin was widely used in livestock at the time.
sentences.chinese: 但对万古霉素的药物类似被广泛应用于家畜当时。

sentences.english: Without activists, the only non-human animals would be farmed animals.
sentences.chinese: 没有他们，唯一的非人类的动物只会是家畜。

sentences.english: Herds are fattening on the early clover.
sentences.chinese: 家畜吃早春的苜蓿而上膘。

sentences.english: Domestic animals are sent to Earth to become companions to the special person assigned to them.
sentences.chinese: 家畜被送往地球，禀旨成为某个特殊人的伙伴。

sentences.english: Improve the disease bearing capability of domestic animals, forfend many diseases.
sentences.chinese: 提高家畜抗病能力，抵御多种疾病。

sentences.english: NiV is also capable of causing disease in pigs and other domestic animals.
sentences.chinese: 尼帕病毒还可导致猪以及其它家畜生病。

sentences.english: Grass is the food of livestock, and is the material foundation of the development of stockbreeding .
sentences.chinese: 牧草是家畜的食粮，是畜牧业发展的物质基础。

sentences.english: Livestock breeding is crucial in this respect, FAO believes.
sentences.chinese: 粮农组织相信，在这方面家畜育种至关重要。

sentences.english: West says drones can be used for crop-dusting and tracking livestock.
sentences.chinese: 韦斯特说无人机可用于作物除尘及家畜追踪。

definition: animals used for their physical strength (mules, oxen etc)/beast of burden
to rear (an animal) in an enclosure
